title: CORIS Bank Retail
description: A highly scalable and secure banking application designed to handle millions of users, providing core banking features and a robust back-office system for efficient management of operations, compliance, and security.
responsibilities: Design and implement modular backend architecture
Develop RESTful web services
Implement activity logs and audits
Handle support requests and production interventions
Analyze functional specifications and document business/system requirements
Integrate external REST APIs
Participate in UAT and production deployment
Test and validate web services
Collaborate with the client's technical team for banking API testing and validation
challenges: Designing a modular backend architecture, integrating external REST APIs, handling support requests, and ensuring regulatory compliance.
outcome: Delivered a scalable and secure application with seamless user and administrator experiences, successfully deployed in production environments.

title: UBank Data Warehouse
description: Developed a PostgreSQL-based data warehouse for a Banking-as-a-Service initiative, centralizing ACH/NACHA and real-time payment data (RTP, FedNow).
responsibilities: Standardized data fields across ACH, RTP, and FedNow for consistency in the data warehouse
Developed custom parsing logic to process and structure data for PostgreSQL integration
Scaled data ingestion workflows to handle large transaction volumes efficiently
Validated data for accuracy and integrity across payment systems
Configured Apache Superset for real-time dashboards and insights

title: BNA Bank
description: Enhancement of an existing banking system with improved authentication, authorization, and validation features using a custom SPI solution and integration with external identity providers.
responsibilities: Create a Java-based application to enhance banking system security
Implement a custom SPI solution for improved authentication, authorization, and validation
Implement user login/authentication via SOAP with Vasco (external identity provider)
Analyze security requirements and document technical specifications
Configure development environment and deploy the solution to production
Implement tests to validate Keycloak and Vasco integration
Write detailed documentation on architecture, configurations, and system integrations
challenges: Implementing seamless integration between Keycloak and Vasco while meeting high-security standards and system requirements.
outcome: Delivered a secure solution for enhanced authentication and authorization, ensuring proper functionality through rigorous testing and documentation.

title: BICICI Bank
description: Development and implementation of an application for customer management, including networking, files, supply contracts, and agents for the International Bank for Commerce and Industry of CÃ´te d'Ivoire.
responsibilities: Testing and validating web services
Addressing technical feedback in production
Monitoring, logging, and auditing
Debugging
Contributing to BPMN creation
challenges: Handling technical feedback in production environments and debugging complex issues.
outcome: Successfully delivered a reliable application for customer management with validated web services and robust monitoring capabilities.

title: MyTT (Tunisie Telecom)
description: Development and implementation of a mobile application for Tunisia Telecom clients as a backend engineer, enabling the management of their telecommunications services, including balance inquiries, online top-ups, and management of offers and services.
responsibilities: Designing and implementing modular backend architecture
Developing REST web services
Consuming SOAP web services
Consuming REST web services
Analyzing and documenting business and system requirements
Writing unit tests and validating web services
Monitoring, logging, and auditing
Debugging
challenges: Designing a modular backend architecture for telecom services and integrating third-party SOAP and REST web services.
outcome: Successfully developed a robust mobile application backend, ensuring smooth integration with Tunisia Telecom's services.

title: Custom Video Player Solution
description: Development and customization of an interactive video player using Vue.js and Vuex to enhance the user experience with custom playback controls, interactive subtitles, and adaptive video quality options.
responsibilities: Designing and implementing user interface for seamless video player experience
Implementing adaptive video quality for optimized performance across devices
Collaborating with backend developers for smooth integration
Conducting testing and debugging for functionality and responsiveness
Implementing Vuex for state management and dynamic updates
Migrating video player from Vue.js 2 with JavaScript to Vue.js 3 with TypeScript
challenges: Ensuring seamless integration with backend services and optimizing the player for different devices.
outcome: Successfully developed an interactive video player with advanced features, integrated with existing backend systems.

title: WebTv Platform
description: Development of a multimedia content management and distribution platform offering video on demand, WebTV, webinars, and live broadcasting with advanced features.
responsibilities: Designing and implementing new features
Migrating from REST APIs to GraphQL
Troubleshooting and resolving production issues
Converting design mockups into responsive websites
Integrating frontend with backend using GraphQL and REST APIs
challenges: Migrating from REST APIs to GraphQL for improved data handling and enhancing platform scalability.
outcome: Successfully implemented a responsive and scalable WebTv platform, with a smooth user experience and enhanced data handling capabilities.

title: SIYOU TECHNOLOGY (B2B)
description: Development of a comprehensive web application to streamline business interactions between companies, built with React, TypeScript, and Ant Design, focusing on an intuitive user experience.
responsibilities: Contributing to B2B app architecture with React
Implementing new features
Designing and implementing responsive UIs
Optimizing application performance
Integrating APIs with backend team
Creating technical documentation
challenges: Optimizing application performance and ensuring responsiveness across devices.
outcome: Successfully delivered a fully responsive and high-performance B2B application for business interactions.

title: SIYOU TECHNOLOGY (B2S2C)
description: Development of an e-commerce solution integrating retail sales, online sales, warehouse, and logistics for B2S2C (Business to Shop to Customer) solutions using Angular.
responsibilities: Developing new features for B2S2C solution using Angular
Designing and implementing responsive UIs
Integrating APIs with backend team
Fixing production issues to improve system reliability
Contributing to B2S and S2C Angular projects
challenges: Integrating various modules and enhancing system reliability.
outcome: Successfully developed a reliable and scalable B2S2C platform, optimized for both retail and online sales.

title: E-Commerce Microservice
description: Microservice application with Spring boot and Spring cloud with several of the microservices distributed patterns like: Configuration servers Discovery server (Eureka) Api Gateway Asynchronous communication with Kafka Synchronous communication with Open Feign and Rest Templates Distribute
responsibilities: Configuration Server for centralized configuration management
Discovery Server (Eureka) for service registration and discovery
API Gateway for routing requests and aggregating responses
Asynchronous Communication using Kafka for event-driven architecture
Synchronous Communication with OpenFeign and RestTemplate for RESTful service calls
Deployment with Kubernetes resources using the Jib Maven Plugin
outcome: Successfully built and deployed a robust microservices architecture using Spring Boot, Spring Cloud, Kafka, and Kubernetes, demonstrating key patterns like service discovery, centralized configuration, and event-driven communication.
